pageProduct.name: Thompson's Maca 1000 60 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thompson's Maca 1000 is traditionally used in Peru as an
aphrodisiac and as a tonic to support vitality, energy and endurance.

Thompson's Maca 1000 is formulated with Peruvian Mao which has traditionally been used in Peru as an aphrodisiac, and as a tonic and adaptogen to support vitality, energy, endurance and stamina. It also helps support healthy mood balance during menopause and provides antioxidants to safeguard against free radical damage.

Suitable For: Vegetarian/Vegan friendly.

Size: 60 Capsules

KEY FEATURES

• formulated with Peruvian Maca which has traditionally been used in Peru as an aphrodisiac
• provides antioxidants to safeguard against free radical damage
• helps support healthy mood balance during menopause

Warnings

If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional.

CAUTION

Do not use if bottle and/or cap seal is missing or broken.
Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Each capsule contains:
Herbal extract equiv. to dry:
Lepidium meyenii (Peruvian Maca) tuber 1g (1000mg).

Allergen Free From: Artificial Colours| Artificial Flavours| Artificial Preservatives| Dairy| Egg| Fish| Gluten| Lactose| Nuts| Sesame Seeds| Soy| Sugar

Directions

Store below 30°C in a dry place.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Remove the cap. Recycle glass bottle.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
